sentences.english: In this section we will analyze the business case and problem in detail.
sentences.chinese: 在本部分中，我们将详细分析业务案例和问题。

sentences.english: Falling in love is the paradigmatic example of  an involuntary  life-affecting desire.
sentences.chinese: 坠入爱河是一个欲望不由自主影响人生的经典案例。

sentences.english: A very good summary of the Tylenol case.
sentences.chinese: 这是对Tylenol案例的很好的总结。

sentences.english: Or the documented cases of methane migration?
sentences.chinese: 或者说是记录在册的甲烷运移的案例呢？

sentences.english: Some cases of explainations of medical classics by professor Xu Ping are presented.
sentences.chinese: 文中列举了几则徐平教授解析“医经”的案例。

sentences.english: In either case, the relevant specification should always prescribe the acceptable performance tolerances .
sentences.chinese: 在其它案例中，相关规范应描述可允收性能允差。

sentences.english: The thesis chooses red tourism of Sichuan as the case of studying the practice of red tourism development.
sentences.chinese: 本文选取四川红色旅游作为红色旅游开发的实践案例。

sentences.english: This is one of those rare cases.
sentences.chinese: 本案属于那种极少数案例之一。

sentences.english: The case of Korean scientist Hwang Woo Suk offers one powerful example.
sentences.chinese: 案例之一，南韩科学家，黄禹锡是一个强有力的例子。

sentences.english: In this example of swimming pool wall the conditions for performing corrosion rate measurements were not ideal.
sentences.chinese: 案例里的游泳池池壁的腐蚀速率测试环境不理想。

sentences.english: I take it cases like this actually do occur.
sentences.chinese: 这样的案例时时有发生的。

sentences.english: By introducing a typical case this paper expounds the common reasons for disbanding a corporation compulsorily in judicial procedure.
sentences.chinese: 以典型案例作引子，阐明了公司司法解散的理由。

sentences.english: It was a classic case of economically counterproductive xenophobia.
sentences.chinese: 这是经济方面反生产仇外症的经典案例。

sentences.english: Case studies are an integral part of knowledge cumulation .
sentences.chinese: 案例研究是知识累积的主要部分。

sentences.english: He argues that the case method is valuable in these sorts of issues.
sentences.chinese: 他认为，案例研究方法对于研究这类问题非常管用。

sentences.english: Choose the part classic documentation for this purpose , specially, the model carrying out temperature wine pot outward appearance analyses.
sentences.chinese: 为此，特选部分典型案例，进行温酒壶外观造型分析。

definition: practice/to put into practice/to live up to (a promise)/to carry out (a project)
